name: Gehirn Analyse
overview: The award-winning multi game for the Commodore C=64 by Welle: Erdball. The German language game GEHIRN-ANALYSE (Brain Analysis)! The beta version won the first prize at the WILLOW Party 2004 in Wellentrup, Germany. Test your brain abilities with up to 4 players and the possibility to enter the list of famous brains. Prove your mental ability in calculating, word pool, photographic mind, reaction and strategy in 9 disciplines.
